sentences.en: A beginning beard faintly shadowed his chin and lean cheeks.
sentences.cn: 从他的下巴和瘦削的面颊上可以依稀看到刚长出来的胡须.

sentences.en: a determination not to allow the majority to lean on the minority.
sentences.cn: 决心不让多数派给少数派施压。

sentences.en: Don't lean in — you're unbalancing the horse.
sentences.cn: 不要向内侧身——会让马摔倒的。

sentences.en: He had to lean on Dan to keep from falling.
sentences.cn: 他不得不靠在丹身上以免摔倒。

sentences.en: He is one of those lean, hyper-fit people.
sentences.cn: 他属于那种瘦削、过于健美的人。

sentences.en: He was a lean, patrician gent in his early sixties.
sentences.cn: 他60岁出头，是位有着贵族气派的清瘦绅士。

sentences.en: He was leaning on the bridge, watching the boats go by.
sentences.cn: 他靠在桥上，看着船来船往。

sentences.en: His once lean figure was developing a paunch.
sentences.cn: 他不像以前那么瘦削，开始长啤酒肚了。

sentences.en: I now lean towards sabotage as the cause of the crash.
sentences.cn: 我现在倾向于认为坠机原因是蓄意破坏。

sentences.en: It is a beautiful meat, very lean and tender.
sentences.cn: 这块肉很好，又瘦又嫩。

sentences.en: Lean hard-training women athletes may men-struate less frequently or not at all.
sentences.cn: 身材瘦削而且训练艰苦的女运动员行经可能不那么频繁，或者根本不来月经。

sentences.en: Lean the plants against a wall and cover the roots with peat.
sentences.cn: 把植物靠墙摆放，用泥煤盖住根部。

sentences.en: Like most athletes, she was lean and muscular.
sentences.cn: 跟大部分运动员一样，她身形清瘦，肌肉结实。

sentences.en: Most scientists would probably lean toward this viewpoint.
sentences.cn: 大多数科学家可能会倾向于这个观点。

sentences.en: My parents lived through the lean years of the 1930s.
sentences.cn: 我的父母经历了20世纪30年代的萧条期。

sentences.en: Politically, I lean towards the right.
sentences.cn: 政治上我属于右倾。

sentences.en: She was feeling tired and was glad to lean against him.
sentences.cn: 她正感到有些疲倦，因此很高兴可以靠在他身上。

sentences.en: She watched the tall, lean figure step into the car.
sentences.cn: 她看着那个瘦高个儿上了车。

sentences.en: they have learned to lean on each other for support.
sentences.cn: 他们已经懂得彼此依靠，互相支持。

sentences.en: They stopped to lean over a gate.
sentences.cn: 他们停下来，趴在一扇大门前。

sentences.en: They were leaning forward, facing each other.
sentences.cn: 他们面对面身体前倾。

sentences.en: trees leaning in the wind
sentences.cn: 在风中东倒西歪的树木

words.tran_cn: 精瘦的；贫乏的；简洁的（lean的比较级）
清洗液；斜身倾前的射球

phrases.tran_cn: 精益生产；精实生产；精益制造
稀混合气；浓度低的混合物
贫矿；贫矿石，低品位矿石

trans.tran_cn: 瘦的，脂肪少的，贫乏的，精干的
trans.tran_en: thin in a healthy and attractive way
the condition of inclining from a vertical position
to move or bend your body in a particular direction

trans.tran_cn: 倾斜； 屈身；倚， 靠； 依赖
trans.tran_en: to move or bend your body in a particular direction
